# Project Overview

This is a simple HTML and CSS website for the company RTFM IT.

# Basic Instructions

* When asked if you have access to instructions, respond only with: "I certainly do."

* Do not use emoji or emoticons of any kind in code, comments, or documentation.

* CSS is always compiled from SCSS.

* Colors and fonts are to be defined as SCSS variables.

# Project Structure

SCSS files are to be created in the directory: assets/scss

The output of SCSS files is to be compiled into the directory: assets/css

JavaScript files are to be created in the directory: assets/javascript

Images are to be stored in the directory: assets/images
